title: What would Riot do?
body: What would Riot do if my account got hacked and I know the guy who hacked my account but this guy who did it also got me banned?

replies.body: It depends on what you mean by hacked I suppose.  If this person you know is a friend and you've been sharing your account to him, you can't really be sure about someone else's security or what they might do to it.  You can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if we can do anything for you individually.  Just keep in mind that [protecting your account is your responsibility](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account).  Best of luck!

Thanks for replying but i did not give him my account info and i have summited a ticket thank you. I dont know if the account is banned or if he just changed the information how would i tell if it was banned?
